items.name: Paul's Goat Hoof
items.caption: Increase movement speed.
items.description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

items.name: Soldier's Syringe
items.caption: Increase attack speed.
items.description: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

items.name: Tougher Times
items.caption: Chance to block incoming damage.
items.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

items.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
items.caption: Gain +10% chance to bleed enemies on hit.
items.description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

items.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
items.caption: Gain 10% chance for hits to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
items.description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

items.name: Crowbar
items.caption: Deal bonus damage to enemies above 90% health.
items.description: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

items.name: Bustling Fungus
items.caption: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 1 second.
items.description: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

items.name: Monster Tooth
items.caption: Drop a healing orb on kill.
items.description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

items.name: Warbanner
items.caption: Drop a Warbanner on level up or starting the Teleporter event. Grants allies attack and movement speed.
items.description: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

items.name: Medkit
items.caption: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.
items.description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

items.name: Gasoline
items.caption: Killing an enemy ignites other nearby enemies.
items.description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

items.name: Stun Grenade
items.caption: Chance to stun on hit.
items.description: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

items.name: Cautious Slug
items.caption: Rapidly heal outside of danger.
items.description: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

items.name: Personal Shield Generator
items.caption: Gain a recharging shield.
items.description: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.caption: Increase sprint speed by +25%.
items.description: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).

items.name: Bundle of Fireworks
items.caption: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.
items.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

items.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
items.caption: Deal extra damage to bosses.
items.description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

items.name: Focus Crystal
items.caption: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.
items.description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).

items.name: Rusted Key
items.caption: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains a powerful item.
items.description: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.

items.name: Backup Magazine
items.caption: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.
items.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

items.name: Sticky Bomb
items.caption: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.
items.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

items.name: Bison Steak
items.caption: Gain 25 max health.
items.description: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).

items.name: Topaz Brooch
items.caption: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.
items.description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

items.name: Repulsion Armor Plate
items.caption: Receive flat damage reduction from all attacks.
items.description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

items.name: Mocha
items.caption: Slightly increase attack speed and movement speed.
items.description: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5 per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).

items.name: Oddly-shaped Opal
items.caption: Reduce damage the first time you are hit.
items.description: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.

items.name: Delicate Watch
items.caption: Deal bonus damage. Breaks at low health.
items.description: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

items.name: Power Elixir
items.caption: Receive an instant heal at low health. Consumed on use.
items.description: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

items.name: Item Scrap, White
items.caption: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: Roll of Pennies
items.caption: Gain gold on taking damage.
items.description: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

items.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
items.caption: Chance to fire a missile.
items.description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

items.name: Will-o'-the-wisp
items.caption: Detonate enemies on kill.
items.description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.

items.name: Hopoo Feather
items.caption: Gain an extra jump.
items.description: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

items.name: Red Whip
items.caption: Move fast out of combat.
items.description: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

items.name: Leeching Seed
items.caption: Dealing damage heals you.
items.description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

items.name: Predatory Instincts
items.caption: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.
items.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.

items.name: Ukulele
items.caption: ...and his music was electric.
items.description: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

items.name: Old War Stealthkit
items.caption: Turn invisible at low health.
items.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).

items.name: Harvester's Scythe
items.caption: 'Critical Strikes' heal you.
items.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

items.name: Fuel Cell
items.caption: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.
items.description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

items.name: Bandolier
items.caption: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
items.description: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

items.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
items.caption: Enter a frenzy after killing 4 enemies in quick succession.
items.description: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

items.name: Wax Quail
items.caption: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.
items.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

items.name: Kjaro's Band
items.caption: High damage hits also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado. Recharges over time.
items.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.

items.name: Chronobauble
items.caption: Slow enemies on hit.
items.description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

items.name: Rose Buckler
items.caption: Reduce incoming damage while sprinting.
items.description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

items.name: Infusion
items.caption: Killing an enemy permanently increases your maximum health, up to 100.
items.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.

items.name: Runald's Band
items.caption: High damage hits also blasts enemies with runic ice. Recharges over time.
items.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.

items.name: War Horn
items.caption: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.
items.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).

items.name: Razorwire
items.caption: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.
items.description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius

items.name: Lepton Daisy
items.caption: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event and 'Holdout Zones' such as the Void Fields.
items.description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.

items.name: Old Guillotine
items.caption: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.
items.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.

items.name: Death Mark
items.caption: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, taking bonus damage.
items.description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Squid Polyp
items.caption: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret nearby.
items.description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.

items.name: Ghor's Tome
items.caption: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.
items.description: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.

items.name: Hunter's Harpoon
items.caption: Killing an enemy gives you a burst of movement speed.
items.description: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 (+0.5 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Shipping Request Form
items.caption: Get a delivery each stage that contains powerful items.
items.description: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity chances of the items per stack).

items.name: Regenerating Scrap
items.caption: Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. Usable once per stage.
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

items.name: Shuriken
items.caption: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken. Recharges over time.
items.description: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% (+100% per stack) base damage. You can hold up to 3 (+1 per stack) shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.

items.name: Item Scrap, Green
items.caption: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: Ignition Tank
items.caption: Your ignite effects deal quadruple damage.
items.description: Ignite effects deal +300% (+300% per stack) more damage over time.

items.name: Brilliant Behemoth
items.caption: All your attacks explode!
items.description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

items.name: Frost Relic
items.caption: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.
items.description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).

items.name: Ceremonial Dagger
items.caption: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.
items.description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.

items.name: Unstable Tesla Coil
items.caption: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.
items.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

items.name: H3AD-5T v2
items.caption: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.
items.description: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.

items.name: 57 Leaf Clover
items.caption: Luck is on your side.
items.description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

items.name: Happiest Mask
items.caption: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.
items.description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).

items.name: N'kuhana's Opinion
items.caption: Fire haunting skulls when healed.
items.description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

items.name: Soulbound Catalyst
items.caption: Kills reduce equipment cooldown.
items.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

items.name: Alien Head
items.caption: Reduces cooldowns for your skills.
items.description: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).

items.name: Sentient Meat Hook
items.caption: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.
items.description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.

items.name: Dio's Best Friend
items.caption: Cheat death. Consumed on use.
items.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

items.name: Hardlight Afterburner
items.caption: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.
items.description: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

items.name: Wake of Vultures
items.caption: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.
items.description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).

items.name: Brainstalks
items.caption: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.
items.description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.

items.name: Rejuvenation Rack
items.caption: Double the strength of healing.
items.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.

items.name: Aegis
items.caption: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.
items.description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.

items.name: Resonance Disc
items.caption: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.
items.description: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

items.name: Shattering Justice
items.caption: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.
items.description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
items.caption: Plant a healing fruit on kill.
items.description:
On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.

The plant heals for 5% of maximum health every 0.5 second to all allies within 10m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.

items.name: Laser Scope
items.caption: Your 'Critical Strikes' deal an additional 100% damage.
items.description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack).

items.name: Symbiotic Scorpion
items.caption: Permanently reduce armor on hit.
items.description: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) permanently.

items.name: Defensive Microbots
items.caption: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.
items.description: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

items.name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
items.caption: All Missile items deal more damage and fire an additional two missiles.
items.description: All missile items and equipment fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% (+50% per stack)

items.name: Spare Drone Parts
items.caption: Your drones fire faster, have less cooldowns, shoot missiles, and gain a bonus chaingun.
items.description: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.

items.name: Ben's Raincoat
items.caption: Become immune to all debuffs. Increase maximum health.
items.description: Whenever you would receive a debuff, prevent it. Increases maximum health by 100 (+100 per stack).

items.name: Bottled Chaos
items.caption: Activating your Equipment triggers an additional, random Equipment effect.
items.description: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 (+1 per stack) time(s).

items.name: Item Scrap, Red
items.caption: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: Queen's Gland
items.caption: Recruit a Beetle Guard.
items.description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

items.name: Titanic Knurl
items.caption: Boosts health and regeneration.
items.description: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).

items.name: Pearl
items.caption: Increase your maximum health.
items.description: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

items.name: Halcyon Seed
items.caption: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.
items.description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.

items.name: Little Disciple
items.caption: Fire tracking wisps while sprinting.
items.description: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

items.name: Irradiant Pearl
items.caption: Increase ALL of your stats.
items.description: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

items.name: Genesis Loop
items.caption: Fire an electric nova at low health.
items.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .

items.name: Artifact Key
items.caption: A stone shard with immense power.
items.description: A stone shard with immense power.

items.name: Molten Perforator
items.caption: Chance on hit to fire magma balls.
items.description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.

items.name: Mired Urn
items.caption: Siphon health from nearby enemies while in combat.
items.description: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

items.name: Planula
items.caption: Receive flat healing when attacked.
items.description: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).

items.name: Shatterspleen
items.caption: Critical strikes always bleed enemies. Bleeding enemies now explode.
items.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.

items.name: Empathy Cores
items.caption: Recruit a pair of Solus Probes that gain power with more allies.
items.description: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.

items.name: Defense Nucleus
items.caption: Summon an Alpha Construct on killing an elite.
items.description: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct. Limited to 4 (+4 per stack).

items.name: Charged Perforator
items.caption: Chance on hit to call down a lightning strike.
items.description: 10% chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.

items.name: Item Scrap, Yellow
items.caption: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: Encrusted Key
items.caption: Gain access to an Encrusted Cache that contains a void item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.
items.description: A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.

items.name: Benthic Bloom
items.caption: Upgrades your items at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.
items.description: Upgrades 3 (+3 per stack) random items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

items.name: Lost Seer's Lenses
items.caption: Gain a 0.5% chance to instantly kill a non-boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.
items.description: Your attacks have a 0.5% (+0.5% per stack) chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.

items.name: Newly Hatched Zoea
items.caption: Periodically recruit allies from the Void. Corrupts all yellow items.
items.description: Every 60 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) allies at a time. Corrupts all yellow items.

items.name: Needletick
items.caption: Chance to collapse enemies on hit. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.
items.description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

items.name: Lysate Cell
items.caption: Add an extra charge of your Special skill. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.
items.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Special skill. Reduces Special skill cooldown by 33%. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

items.name: Plasma Shrimp
items.caption: While you have shield, fire missiles on every hit. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.
items.description: Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% (+40% per stack) TOTAL damage. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

items.name: Pluripotent Larva
items.caption: Get a corrupted extra life. Consumed on use. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.
items.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.

items.name: Polylute
items.caption: Chance to repeatedly strike a single enemy with lightning. Corrupts all Ukuleles.
items.description: 25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+3 per stack) times. Corrupts all Ukuleles.

items.name: Safer Spaces
items.caption: Block the next source of damage. Corrupts all Tougher Times.
items.description: Blocks incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack) Corrupts all Tougher Times.

items.name: Singularity Band
items.caption: High damage hits also create unstable black holes. Recharges over time. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.
items.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.

items.name: Tentabauble
items.caption: Chance to root enemies on hit. Corrupts all Chronobaubles.
items.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to root enemies for 1s (+1s per stack). Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

items.name: Voidsent Flame
items.caption: Full health enemies also detonate on hit. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.
items.description: Upon hitting an enemy at full health, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 260% (+156% per stack) base damage. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.

items.name: Shaped Glass
items.caption: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.
items.description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

items.name: Weeping Fungus
items.caption: Heal while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.
items.description: Heals for 2% (+2% per stack) of your health every second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

items.name: Brittle Crown
items.caption: Gain gold on hit... BUT surrender gold on getting hit.
items.description:
30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time.

Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

items.name: Transcendence
items.caption: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.
items.description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

items.name: Gesture of the Drowned
items.caption: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.
items.description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

items.name: Beads of Fealty
items.caption: Seems to do nothing... but...
items.description: Seems to do nothing... but...

items.name: Focused Convergence
items.caption: Increase the speed of Teleporter charging... BUT reduce the size of the zone.
items.description: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

items.name: Strides of Heresy
items.caption: Replace your Utility Skill with 'Shadowfade'.
items.description:
Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.

Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Corpsebloom
items.caption: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.
items.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.

items.name: Visions of Heresy
items.caption: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.
items.description:
Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.

Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

items.name: Hooks of Heresy
items.caption: Replace your Secondary Skill with 'Slicing Maelstrom'.
items.description:
Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom.

Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Egocentrism
items.caption: Gain multiple orbiting bombs. Every minute, assimilate another item into Egocentrism.
items.description: Every 3 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 bombs (+1 per stack). Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.

items.name: Eulogy Zero
items.caption: Items and equipment have a small chance to transform into a Lunar item instead.
items.description: Items have a 5% (+5% per stack) chance to become a Lunar item instead.

items.name: Purity
items.caption: Reduce your skill cooldowns by 2 seconds. You are unlucky.
items.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

items.name: Mercurial Rachis
items.caption: Randomly create a Ward of Power. ALL characters deal bonus damage while in the Ward.
items.description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

items.name: Defiant Gouge
items.caption: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby.
items.description: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.

items.name: Stone Flux Pauldron
items.caption: Double your health... BUT halve your speed.
items.description: Increase max health by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce movement speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

items.name: Light Flux Pauldron
items.caption: Halve your cooldowns.. BUT halve your attack speed.
items.description: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack). Decrease attack speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

items.name: Disposable Missile Launcher
items.caption: Fire a swarm of missiles.
items.description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.

items.name: Effigy of Grief
items.caption: Drop a permanent effigy that cripples ALL characters inside. Can place up to 5.
items.description: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5.

items.name: Glowing Meteorite
items.caption: Rain meteors from the sky, hurting both enemies and allies.
items.description: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.

items.name: Essence of Heresy
items.caption: Replace your Special Skill with 'Ruin'.
items.description:
Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.

Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Helfire Tincture
items.caption: Burn everything nearby... including you and allies.
items.description: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning as damage. The burn is 0.5x stronger on yourself, 0.25x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.

items.name: Spinel Tonic
items.caption: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats. Chance to gain an affliction that reduces ALL stats.
items.description:
Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.

When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).

items.name: Primordial Cube
items.caption: Fire a black hole that draws enemies in.
items.description: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds

items.name: Foreign Fruit
items.caption: Heal on use.
items.description: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.

items.name: Preon Accumulator
items.caption: Fire a ball of energy that electrocutes nearby enemies before detonating.
items.description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.

items.name: Milky Chrysalis
items.caption: Gain temporary flight.
items.description: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.

items.name: Goobo Jr.
items.caption: Create a clone of you for 30 seconds.
items.description: Spawn a gummy clone that has 170% damage and 170% health. Expires in 30 seconds.

items.name: Ocular HUD
items.caption: Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
items.description: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

items.name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn
items.caption: Execute a large monster and claim its trophy. Consumed on use.
items.description: Execute any enemy capable of spawning a unique reward, and it will drop that item. Equipment is consumed on use.

items.name: Royal Capacitor
items.caption: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster.
items.description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.

items.name: The Back-up
items.caption: Call drones for back up. Lasts 25 seconds.
items.description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.

items.name: Molotov (6-Pack)
items.caption: Throw 6 flaming molotovs that ignite enemies upon shattering.
items.description: Throw 6 molotov cocktails that ignites enemies for 500% base damage. Each molotov leaves a burning area for 200% damage per second.

items.name: Executive Card
items.caption: Gain 10% cash back on all purchases. Multishops remain open.
items.description: Whenever you make a gold purchase, get 10% of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a multishop terminal, the other terminals will remain open.

items.name: Eccentric Vase
items.caption: Create a quantum tunnel between two locations.
items.description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.

items.name: Gnarled Woodsprite
items.caption: Heal over time. Activate to send to an ally.
items.description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.

items.name: Blast Shower
items.caption: Cleanse all negative effects.
items.description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

items.name: Radar Scanner
items.caption: Reveal all nearby interactables.
items.description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

items.name: The Crowdfunder
items.caption: Toggle to fire. Costs gold per bullet.
items.description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.

items.name: Volcanic Egg
items.caption: Transform into a speeding draconic fireball, dealing damage as you pass through enemies.
items.description: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.

items.name: Jade Elephant
items.caption: Gain massive armor for 5 seconds.
items.description: Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds.

items.name: Sawmerang
items.caption: Throw a fan of buzzing saws that come back to you.
items.description: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back.

items.name: Remote Caffeinator
items.caption: Request a healing soda machine.
items.description: Request an Eclipse Zero Vending Machine from the UES Safe Travels. Delivery guaranteed in 5 seconds, dealing 2000% damage. Heal up to 3 targets for 25% of their maximum health.

items.name: Gorag's Opus
items.caption: You and all your allies enter a frenzy.
items.description: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

items.name: Recycler
items.caption: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only recycle once.
items.description: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.

items.name: Ifrit's Distinction
items.caption: Become an aspect of fire.
items.description: Become an aspect of fire.

items.name: Forgive Me Please
items.caption: Throw a cursed doll that repeatedly triggers your 'On Kill' effects.
items.description: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.

items.name: Super Massive Leech
items.caption: Heal for a percentage of the damage you deal for 8 seconds.
items.description: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.

items.name: His Reassurance
items.caption: Become an aspect of earth.
items.description: Become an aspect of earth.

items.name: Spectral Circlet
items.caption: Become an aspect of incorporeality.
items.description: Become an aspect of incorporeality.

items.name: Silence Between Two Strikes
items.caption: Become an aspect of lightning.
items.description: Become an aspect of lightning.

items.name: Her Biting Embrace
items.caption: Become an aspect of ice.
items.description: Become an aspect of ice.

items.name: Shared Design
items.caption: Become an aspect of perfection.
items.description: Become an aspect of perfection.

items.name: N'kuhana's Retort
items.caption: Become an aspect of corruption.
items.description: Become an aspect of corruption.

items.name: Fuel Array
items.caption: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...
items.description: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...
